item.title: Batch no. 2 return statement
item.description:
My Recurse center half-batch ended yesterday. This is my reflections post. We used to call these "return statements," because that's what happens at the end of a function, and also I guess it's like a return to normalcy. So this is my return statement.

Six weeks is really not a very long time, and I was conscious of that going in. Going to RC and being surrounded by interesting ideas and interesting people and also, cr...

item.title: Building a tiny little broken calculator with parser combinators
item.description:
Perhaps I have a string lying around somewhere...

const testString = "Abcd123";

What a lovely little string.

I will start with a function that takes a string as input and tells you if the input passes some test you've set out for it. This is not yet a parser, not really. Usually, a parser does quite a lot mor...

item.title: Makin' wavs with Zig
item.description:
